Articles.Content:
Hey all,

 

So I'm starting a fresh save on my newly updated 1.3 version of KSP. It's been a few patches since i played in 1.1.3

 

I'm looking for a science mod that allows me to collect science experiments without hunting down and clicking on the experiment itself. I had a mod like this in 1.1.3 that simply had a display window and when an experiment was available it allowed me to click the button to run the experiment. The popup window for this mod looked a lot like KEI does except it's not a cheat like KEI is. 

 

Mods I've tried but don't fit the bill:

 

XScience- I think the older version of this mod allowed the user to "click" run experiment once it showed one was available. But as far as i can see all it does now is show what experiments are left to do. 

Automated science sampler- This is as close as i can get, except that it automatically does my science for me. I want it to pop up and show me that there is science to do but not do it without my authority. If i missed taking a temp scan of the upper kerbin atmosphere but my mission states to take a temp scan near the mun, i don't want my temp experiment being exausted before i ever get into orbit(only jeb on board).

For Science- Nope, doesn't look like it either. 

 

Science Alert seems to be the type of mod I'm looking for except that it's been yanked and not updated.

It's x science that you want. The confusing thing is that it adds 2 buttons to the toolbar. One gives you the list of all science experiments and the other gives you the same functionality as science alert

7 hours ago, Cadet_BNSF said:

experiment tracker, maybe?

 

Unfortunately hasn't been updated to 1.3.  A shame - I like it much better than [x]Science.
